result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Coleonn M McAfee Brown

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Coleonn M McAfee Brown in court with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.  Sue Opper appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The charge is dismissed and read into 15CF929 and 15CF1083.

Defendant Coleonn M McAfee Brown in court, in custody, with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney has received discover and an offer.  The jury trial date remains on as scheduled in case 15CF929.
Hearing at 12-03-2015 08:30 am
Hearing at 10-30-2015 08:30 am

Defendant Coleonn M McAfee Brown in court, in custody, with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.   Mary C. Brejcha appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense hasn't received discovery on 15CF1083 and has not received a global offer. Bail reduction letter filed by the defendant addressed by the Court. Defense to file a more formal bail modication motion. Defense addresses bail at this time.  State objects to modifying bail. Court denies the motion to modify bail. Discovery to be turned over to defense in one week. Court will give a jury trial date on 15CF929. The other matters (15CF1083 and 15CM175) to trail along.  Court will also give a status date to review the matters.  Hearing scheduled for October 30, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Hearing scheduled for December 3, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Filed by the Defendant requesting a bail reduction.
Hearing at 10-05-2015 09:00 am

Defendant Coleonn M McAfee Brown in court, in custody, with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.   Abbey Nickolie appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant was in the juvenile diversion program but has new charges. Defense requests one more review hearing. Court will continue 15CF929 and15CM175 with 15CF1083 on the next date already scheduled. Defense to advise on the next date how they will proceed.  Hearing scheduled for October 5, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Hearing on September 18, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Coleonn M McAfee Brown in court with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.  Susan L. Opper appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED.  Hearing scheduled for September 18, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Dated August 9, 2015 filed by Attorney Fragoso requesting that 15CM175 be heard along with 15CM929.
Hearing on August 14, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Coleonn M McAfee Brown in court with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.  Barbara A. Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant has not started the 180 diversion program. The defendant needs to work out arrangements with the program. Court will give another date in 3 weeks.  Hearing scheduled for August 14, 2015 at 10:00 am.
Hearing on July 15, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Coleonn M McAfee Brown in court with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.  Lesli S Boese appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense requests another date in 30 days to see if the defendant can work out the 180 program.  Defendant to complete the 180 diversion program and State will dismiss the charges. Court will give a date in 3 weeks. Defense to advise how they will proceed on the next date.  Hearing scheduled for July 15, 2015 at 10:00 am.
Hearing on June 22, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Coleonn M McAfee Brown in court with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.  Brian J. Juech appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is getting an AODA assessment and requests another date in 30 days. Court grants request.  Hearing scheduled for June 22, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Notice of Hearing returned, for hearing scheduled on: 5/22/15.
Hearing on May 22, 2015 at 10:30 am.
Attorney appears by authorization

Attorney Reisha Mitchell appeared for attorney Jorge R Fragoso.   Defendant Coleonn M McAfee Brown did not appear.   Brian J. Juech appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Attorney appears by authorization.  Atty. MItchell requests another date in 30 days. Court grants request. Defense to advise the Court on the next date if this matter will be a plea or trial.  Hearing scheduled for May 22, 2015 at 10:30 am.
Hearing on April 23, 2015 at 10:00 am.
Hearing on April 1, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Coleonn M McAfee Brown in court.  Andrea M. Will appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant to apply at Public Defender's Office for representation or  Defendant to seek counsel. Court will give another date in 3 weeks.  Hearing scheduled for April 1, 2015 at 10:00 am.
Notice of Hearing returned, for hearing scheduled on: 3/12/15.
Hearing on March 12, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.  Defendant not to possess any drug paraphernalia.

Defendant Coleonn M McAfee Brown in court.  Timothy F. Westphal appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court advises of right to an attorney.   Defendant to apply at Public Defender's Office for representation.   NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT. 
  Hearing scheduled for March 12, 2015 at 09:00 am.
